parameters.description: Paginate through collections of data by setting the `cursor` parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request's `response_metadata`. Default value fetches the first "page" of the collection. See [pagination](/docs/pagination) for more detail.
parameters.name: cursor

parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return.
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: This method either only returns a brief _not OK_ response or a verbose schema is not available for this method.
schema.title: Default error template
